RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 40100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June13 Allow ed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR LOOOCH stalked the early pace three wide, rallied at the quarter pole and drew close, drew off in the stretch while being ridden out BEAT THE DEALER was unhurried early and trailed, rallied in the stretch four wide and finished well. MUTINY raced close up throughout and went evenly late. RUMBLE STRIP RON allowed to settle, failed to menace. STUNT MAN raced mid pack and was no threat. ZAKARIA set the pace until the top of the stretch then tired. BETCHAIWILL had good position, early and was through after a half. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced close up, throughout and went evenly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SCRIMPER broke alertly and quickly gained a clear lead, led throughout and widened under a hand ride to win as much the best. MAY MAYHEM chased the winner throughout, was no match late but held place. FACT NOT FICTION was off slowly, reached a contenting position early and faded in the lane. TADZIO was fractious gate, raced close up early and tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Tadzio
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate raced close up early and tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUIET AMIGO was away alertly and quickly made the lead, was nicely rated on the front end, led throughout and remained clear late under right handed urging. SUSIE'S KID chased the winner throughout, could not gain late but was second best. ROCK ON KITTEN saved ground throughout and finished willingly. LUCKY JUNIOR never far back, lacked a late response and went evenly. TONY SMALL pressed three wide and weakened in the stretch. DARK TIMBER stumbled badly at the start and was no threat.

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout and finished willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRACTICALLYELUSIVE was checked at the start while between horses, had a quick move three wide down the backside and quickly reached contention, drew off quickly in the stretch to win as much the best in handy fashion. SALTMAKESHERSWEET set the early pace, was hooked at the quarter pole, was no match for winner in the stretch, but held place. KISS ME QUICK contended throughout and went evenly late. WILD MARIAH allowed to settle, failed to menace. HONEY BEE GOOD had brief foot and was through early.

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Cons idered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DATTTSAFANCYFOX dueled early, drifted out in the stretch, held gamely after a long stretch battle, prevailed and returned bleeding from the nostrils. MISS EASY was never far back, rallied on the inside, drifted out late and just missed. WORTHINESS vied for the early lead, was carried out in the stretch, held stoutly in the stretch and just missed MY DANCING QUEEN raced close up throughout and weakened ,late. CONTESSINA was no threat while three wide. MY D'VALENTINE had brief foot and quickly gave way. The stewards posted the inquiry sign and the rider of WORTHINESS claimed foul against the rider of MISS EASY and DATTSAFANCYFOX for alleged interference in the stretch. After viewing the tape the stewards took no action.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Easy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn
